text: @GOPLeader They were NOT created- people just went back to work- unfortunately many of them will have to stop working again, because your friend in the WH has mismanaged the #coronavirus outbreak so horribly. #TRE45ON #VoteOutTheGOP #TrumpKnewAndDidNothing
